outside-hours.label: Outside Normal Hours
outside-hours.tooltip: Allows entry to places outside the normal entry hours.
stranger-entry.label: Stranger Room Entry
stranger-entry.tooltip: Allows entry to single room homes and bedrooms before having a high enough relationship.
early-guild.label: Early Adventurer's Guild
early-guild.tooltip: Allows entry to Adventurer's Guild before being accepted. Approach the door once to unlock it.
